name: Peanut Butter Cup Smoothie
description: Tastes just like a chocolate peanut butter cup! Itâ€™s like dessert for breakfast and, thanks to the protein, will help keep you full until lunch.

ingredients.name: Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend or Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend or Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend

preparation: In a blender, combine all ingredients. If you like it thicker, add ice cubes; for a thinner consistency, add water. Blend until smooth and pour into a tall glass or take it with you in a Shaker.
tips: Make it a Smoothie Bowl: Simply pour into a bowl and top with fruit.
If using Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend, add in 1 tbsp cocoa for the chocolate flavour.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup fresh berries and 1 slice multigrain bread.

products.name: Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend
